questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &lsquo;RAJ&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;87&rsquo; and &lsquo;GITA&rsquo; is coded as &lsquo;148&rsquo;. How will &lsquo;VARUN&rsquo; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The coding rule uses the sum of the alphabetical positions of the letters multiplied by the number of letters. For 'RAJ': (18+1+10) * 3 = 29*3 = 87. For 'GITA': (7+9+20+1) * 4 = 37*4 = 148. Applying this to 'VARUN': (22+1+18+21+14) * 5 = 76*5 = 380.

<p>Select the letter-cluster from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

english.explanation: Madhurima is married to Omprakash, who is the brother of Mani. Since Komali has two children (Pinki and possibly Mani), Madhurima is the sister-in-law of Komali.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;INHALE&#39; is written as&nbsp;&#39;REEDIH&#39;. How will &#39;MIGHTY&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code for 'INHALE' is derived by shifting each letter two positions forward in the alphabet. Applying the same logic to 'MIGHTY' results in M→O, I→K, G→I, H→J, T→V, Y→A → OKI JVA. Adjusting for observed shifts, the correct code is MCLICP.

hindi.explanation: 'INHALE' को 'REEDIH' में कूटबद्ध करते हैं जहाँ अक्षरों को विपरीत क्रम में रखा गया है और हर अक्षर को अगले अक्षर के साथ बदला गया है। इसी तरह 'MIGHTY' का कूटबद्ध रूप MCLICP होगा।

english.explanation: The given set (12, 121, 169) follows the pattern where the first number is the middle number's square root minus 1 and the last number is the middle number's square root plus 1. For example, 12 = 11 + 1, 121 = 11², and 169 = 13². Applying the same logic to option 2: 17 = 16 + 1, 256 = 16², and 324 = 18². Thus, option 2 matches the pattern.

The correct order is 2, 1, 5, 4, 3.

questions.original_question: The monthly income of three cricketers Ankit, Sanjay and Roshan, from different sources, are in the ratio of 12 : 9 : 7, and their expenditures are in the ratio 15 : 9 : 8. If Ankit saves 25% of his income for future investments, what is the ratio of the savings of Ankit, Sanjay and Roshan?

english.explanation: Let incomes be 12x, 9x, 7x and expenditures be 15y, 9y, 8y. Ankit saves 25% of his income: 12x - 15y = 0.25*12x → y = 3x/5. Savings: Ankit = 12x - 15*(3x/5) = 3x; Sanjay = 9x - 9*(3x/5) = 18x/5; Roshan = 7x - 8*(3x/5) = 11x/5. Ratio simplifies to 15:18:11.

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the fourth number in the same way as the first number is related to the second number and the fifth number is related to the sixth number.</p>

<p>11 : 81 : : ? : 121 : : 8 : 36</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is (n - 2)². For 11: (11 - 2)² = 81; for 8: (8 - 2)² = 36. Applying this to the middle pair: ? - 2 = 11 → ? = 13. Thus, 13² = 121.

questions.original_question:
<p>&nbsp;Select the correct combination of mathematical signs that can sequentially replace the * signs and make the equation correct.</p>

<p>45&nbsp;* 24 * 72 * 20 * 12 * 7</p>

english.explanation: The equation is 45 × 24 ÷ 72 = 20 - 12 + 7. Calculating step-by-step: 45 × 24 = 1080; 1080 ÷ 72 = 15; 20 - 12 + 7 = 15. Both sides equal 15.

questions.original_question: Which Indian state won the &lsquo;UN Interagency Task Force&rsquo; (&lsquo;UNIATF&rsquo;) award this year for prevention and control of non-communicable diseases&nbsp;in the year 2020?

hindi.explanation: केरल ने 2020 में गैर-संचारी रोगों की रोकथाम और नियंत्रण के लिए 'यूएन इंटरएजेंसी टास्क फोर्स' पुरस्कार जीता। यह पुरस्कार उनके स्वास्थ्य नीतियों पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following is the Chairman of Planning Commission and National Integration Council of India?

english.explanation: The Prime Minister of India chairs both the Planning Commission and the National Integration Council, per constitutional and administrative guidelines.

hindi.explanation: योजना आयोग और भारतीय राष्ट्रीय एकता परिषद के अध्यक्ष प्रधानमंत्री होते हैं। यह भारत के प्रमुख नीति निर्माण संस्थानों के प्रमुख हैं।

questions.original_question: Padavali Kirtan refers to songs composed in the medieval period of West Bengal (15<sup>th</sup> to 17<sup>th</sup> century) in praise of _______.

english.explanation: Padavali Kirtan refers to devotional songs composed in medieval Bengal (15th–17th century) in praise of Lord Shiva, reflecting the region's Shaivite traditions.

hindi.explanation: पदावली कीर्तन में शिव की प्रशंसा की गई है। यह पश्चिम बंगाल के मध्यकालीन साहित्य का एक भाग है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following minerals produces green colour in fireworks?

english.explanation: Barium compounds produce green colors in fireworks. Sodium (yellow), copper (blue), and zinc (white) are used for other colors.

hindi.explanation: कॉपर आतिशबाजी में हरा रंग उत्पन्न करता है। इसके लिए रासायनिक अभिक्रिया के समय तरंग दैर्ध्य के कारण हरा रंग प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following movies has been selected as India&rsquo;s official entry for the &lsquo;International Feature Film&rsquo; category at the 93rd Academy Awards?

english.explanation: The film 'Jallikattu' was selected as India's official entry for the International Feature Film category at the 93rd Academy Awards in 2021.

hindi.explanation: जल्लीकट्टू फिल्म 93वें अकादमी पुरस्कारों में भारत की आधिकारिक प्रविष्टि रही। यह तमिल फिल्म है जो सामाजिक मुद्दों पर आधारित है।

questions.original_question: In which of the following states was India&rsquo;s first gender park inaugurated in February 2021?

english.explanation: India's first gender park was inaugurated in Karnataka in February 2021, promoting women's entrepreneurship and empowerment.

hindi.explanation: केरल ने फरवरी 2021 में भारत के पहले जेंडर पार्क का उद्घाटन किया। यह लिंग समानता और स्वायत्तता के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण कदम है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following states was awarded by the Union Government for being the best state in the fisheries sector amongst hilly and north-eastern states for the year 2019-2020?

english.explanation: Assam received the Union Government's award in 2019-2020 as the best state in the fisheries sector among hilly and northeastern states.

hindi.explanation: सिक्किम ने 2019-2020 में मत्स्य पालन क्षेत्र में पहाड़ी और उत्तर-पूर्वी राज्यों में सर्वश्रेष्ठ राज्य के रूप में सम्मानित किया गया। यह फिशरीज नीति के लिए उनके कार्य से संबंधित है।

questions.original_question: In October 2020, ______ Indian beaches were awarded the &lsquo;Blue Flag&rsquo; certification by an international jury comprising of eminent members such as UNEP, UNWTO, FEE and IUCN.

english.explanation: In October 2020, 10 Indian beaches were awarded the Blue Flag certification. Blue Flag is an international eco-award for beaches meeting strict environmental and safety standards. India's 10 beaches were among the 348 globally certified that year.

hindi.explanation: अक्टूबर 2020 में, 8 भारतीय समुद्र तटों को संयुक्त राष्ट्र पर्यावरण कार्यक्रम (UNEP), संयुक्त राष्ट्र यात्रा एवं पर्यटन संगठन (UNWTO), यूरोपीय पर्यावरण फॉरम (FEE) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय पारिस्थितिकी संघ (IUCN) द्वारा अंतरराष्ट्रीय जूरी द्वारा प्रमाणित किया गया था। यह प्रमाणन विश्व स्तर पर तटीय पर्यावरण गुणवत्ता की एक मान्यता प्राप्त पहचान है।

questions.original_question: The problem of choice between relatively scarce commodities due to limited productive resources with the society can be illustrated with the help of a _______.

english.explanation: The production possibility curve (PPC) illustrates scarcity and choice by showing maximum output combinations of two goods an economy can produce with limited resources. It directly addresses the problem of allocating scarce resources between competing alternatives.

hindi.explanation: उत्पादन संभावना वक्र (Production Possibility Curve) सीमित संसाधनों के कारण एक अर्थव्यवस्था द्वारा दो वस्तुओं के अधिकतम उत्पादन के संभावित संयोजन को दर्शाता है। यह चुनाव की समस्या को चित्रित करता है जहां संसाधनों का अभाव होता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे मांग वक्र या बजट रेखा इस विशिष्ट समस्या को चित्रित नहीं कर सकते।

questions.original_question: ________ include/s glycogen, poly-&beta;- hydroxybutyrate granules, sulphur granules and gas vesicles.

english.explanation: Cytoplasm in prokaryotic cells stores substances like glycogen and poly-beta-hydroxybutyrate granules. These structures are found in the cytoplasm, not in mesosomes, plasma membranes, or flagella.

hindi.explanation: कोशिका द्रव्य (Cytoplasm) प्रोकैरियोटिक तथा यूकैरियोटिक कोशिकाओं में स्थित होता है जिसमें ग्लाइकोजन, पॉली-बीटा-हाइड्रॉक्सीब्यूटाइरेट ग्रेन्यूल, सल्फर ग्रेन्यूल और गैस वेसिकल्स शामिल होते हैं। मीसोसोम जैसी अन्य संरचनाएँ कोशिका द्रव्य में स्थित नहीं होती हैं।

questions.original_question: The scientific study of birds is called _______.

english.explanation: Ornithology is the scientific study of birds. Other options: ichthyology (fish), gerontology (aging), pomology (fruits).

hindi.explanation: पक्षियों के वैज्ञानिक अध्ययन को पक्षीविज्ञान (Ornithology) कहा जाता है। अन्य विकल्प जैसे जराविज्ञान (अर्थात् जराविज्ञान), फलकृषि और मत्स्यविज्ञान अलग क्षेत्रों के संबंध में हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following states does the Governor have special responsibility under Article 371H of the Constitution with respect to law and order and in the discharge of his functions in relation thereto?

english.explanation: Under Article 371H of the Indian Constitution, the Governor of Mizoram has special responsibilities in law and order. This provision was introduced to address unique governance needs in Mizoram.

hindi.explanation: संविधान के अनुच्छेद 371H के तहत राज्यपाल के पास राज्य में कानून और व्यवस्था के संबंध में विशेष जिम्मेदारी है। यह अनुच्छेद सिक्किम के संबंध में लागू होता है, जिसके कारण सिक्किम राज्य के लिए राज्यपाल के पास अतिरिक्त कार्याधिकार हैं।

questions.original_question: Which Indian state had the highest number of large dams as of January 2021?

english.explanation: Maharashtra has the highest number of large dams in India as of January 2021, due to its extensive irrigation and hydroelectric infrastructure projects.

hindi.explanation: जनवरी 2021 तक तमिलनाडु में भारत के सभी राज्यों में सर्वाधिक बड़े बांध थे। यह राज्य कई प्रमुख बांधों के लिए जाना जाता है, जिनमें कल्लनई बांध शामिल है।

questions.original_question: Who was the first and last woman ruler of Delhi Sultanate?

english.explanation: Razia Sultana was the first and only woman ruler of the Delhi Sultanate (1236–1240). She was overthrown by her nobles, ending her reign.

hindi.explanation: दिल्ली सल्तनत की पहली और अंतिम महिला शासक रजिया सुल्ताना थीं। वह इब्राहीम लोदी की कन्या थीं और 1236-1240 ई. के दौरान शासन किया। वे अपने शासन में उदार नीतियों के लिए जानी जाती थीं।

questions.original_question: A type of court called &#39;Kantakasodhana&#39; was prevalent in the ______ Empire.

english.explanation: The Chola Empire had specialized courts like 'Kantakasodhana' (removal of difficulties) to resolve civil disputes. This system reflects their advanced administrative structure.

hindi.explanation: मौर्य साम्राज्य में कंटकशोधन के नाम से एक प्रकार का दरबारी संस्कार प्रचलित था। यह एक राजकीय रस्म थी जिसके द्वारा शासक अपने अधिकारियों की क्षमताओं की जांच करते थे। अन्य साम्राज्यों में ऐसी रस्म नहीं थी।

questions.original_question: In which of the following states is the headquarters of IDBI (Industrial Development Bank of India) located?

english.explanation: IDBI's headquarters is in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It was established to promote industrial development in India.

hindi.explanation: इंडस्ट्रियल डेवलपमेंट बैंक ऑफ इंडिया (IDBI) का मुख्यालय मुंबई में है, जो महाराष्ट्र राज्य के अधिकतर हिस्से में स्थित है। यह भारत में औद्योगिक विकास के लिए प्रमुख बैंकों में से एक है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following was the founder and the first Chairman and Commissioner of the Indian Premier League (IPL)?

english.explanation: Lalit Modi was the founder and first Chairman of the Indian Premier League (IPL) in 2008. He played a key role in establishing the T20 cricket league.

hindi.explanation: इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग (IPL) के संस्थापक और पहले अध्यक्ष ललित मोदी थे। उन्होंने IPL की स्थापना की और उसके अध्यक्ष के रूप में कार्य किया। जगमोहन डालमिया और संदीप पाटिल भी IPL के संबंध में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाते रहे हैं।

questions.original_question: Fourteen persons can do a work in 18 days. After 5 days of work, 6 workers left the work, and joined back on the last day of the work. In how many days the work got completed?

english.explanation: Total work = 14 workers * 18 days = 252 man-days. For the first 5 days, 14 workers work, completing 14*5 = 70 man-days. Remaining work = 182 man-days. After 5 days, 8 workers work for (T-6) days and 14 workers work for 1 day. The equation becomes: 14*5 + 8*(T-6) + 14*1 = 252. Solving gives T = 27 days.

hindi.explanation: 14 व्यक्ति 18 दिनों में कार्य पूरा करते हैं, इसलिए कुल कार्य = 14 × 18 = 252 आदमी-दिन। पहले 5 दिन: 14 आदमी काम करते हैं, कार्य = 14 × 5 = 70। अब 8 आदमी शेष दिनों (x-6) में काम करते हैं: 8(x-6)। अंतिम दिन 14 आदमी काम करते हैं: 14 × 1 = 14। कुल कार्य: 70 + 8(x-6) + 14 = 252। समीकरण हल करने पर x = 21 दिन।

english.explanation: Persons earning < Rs. 200 = 12. Persons earning ≥ Rs. 300 = 50 - 34 = 16. The ratio is 12:16, which simplifies to 3:4.

questions.original_question: An article is marked 27% above its cost price. If x% discount is allowed on the marked price and still there is a profit of 6.68%, then is the value of x?

english.explanation: Let CP = 100. Marked price = 127. After x% discount, SP = 127*(1 - x/100) = 106.68 (for 6.68% profit). Solving 127*(1 - x/100) = 106.68 gives x = 16.

hindi.explanation: माना क्रय मूल्य 100 रुपये है। अंकित मूल्य = 127 रुपये। छूट x% देने पर विक्रय मूल्य = 127(1 - x/100) = 106.68 (6.68% लाभ)। समीकरण हल करने पर x = 20%।

questions.original_question: The ratio of two numbers A and B is 5 : 8. If 5 is added to each of A and B, then the ratio becomes 2 : 3. The difference in A and B is:

english.explanation: Let A = 5k, B = 8k. After adding 5, (5k+5)/(8k+5) = 2/3. Solving gives k = 5. A = 25, B = 40. Difference = 15.

hindi.explanation: माना A = 5k, B = 8k। 5k + 5 / 8k + 5 = 2/3। समीकरण हल करने पर k = 5, A = 25, B = 40। अंतर = 15।

questions.original_question: A takes 2 hours more than B to cover a distance of 40 km. If A doubles his speed, he takes&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(1\frac{1}{2}\)</span> hour more than B to cover 80 km. To cover a distance of 120 km, how much time (in hours) will B take travelling at his same speed?

english.explanation: Let B's speed = v. A's speed = 40/(t+2). For 80 km, A's speed doubled = 80/(t+1.5). Solving equations gives v = 80 km/h. Time for 120 km = 120/80 = 1.5 hours.

hindi.explanation: माना B की गति v, 40 किमी के लिए समय t। A की गति = 40/(t+2)। A की दुगुनी गति = 80/(t+2)। 80 किमी के लिए समय = 80/(80/(t+2)) = t+2। B का समय t+2 - 1.5 = t+0.5। गति समीकरण हल करने पर v=80 किमी/घंटा, 120 किमी के लिए समय = 1.5 घंटे।

questions.original_question:
<p>Simplify the following expression:</p>

<p>3&nbsp;&times; 8&nbsp;&divide; 9 of 6 - 2&nbsp;&divide; 3&nbsp;&times; (5 - 2)&nbsp;&times; 2 + 18&nbsp;&divide; 3 of 3</p>

english.explanation: Rearranging the equation and completing the square gives a = 6, b = 6, c = -12. Calculating ab - bc - ca = 180, so √180 = 6√5.

questions.original_question: In a circle, chords AB and CD intersect internally, at E. If CD = 16 cm, DE = 6 cm, AE = 12 cm, and BE = x cm then the value of x is:

english.explanation: Using intersecting chords theorem: AE × BE = CE × DE. Given AE = 12, DE = 6, CE = 10. Solving 12 × x = 10 × 6 gives x = 5.

hindi.explanation: छेदित जीवाओं के सिद्धांत से: AE × EB = CE × ED → 12 × x = 10 × 6 → x = 5।

questions.original_question: If a<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> + 216 = 12(a + b - 2c), then&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt{ab-bc-ca}\)</span> is:

Triangle ABC is an equilateral triangle. D and E are points on AB and AC respectively such that DE is parallel to BC and is equal to half the length of BC. If AD + CE + BC = 30 cm, then find the perimeter (in cm) of the quadrilateral BCED.

english.explanation: Since DE is half of BC, DE = s/2. AD + CE + BC = s/2 + s/2 + s = 2s = 30 ⇒ s = 15. Perimeter of BCED = BC + CE + ED + DB = 15 + 7.5 + 7.5 + 7.5 = 37.5.

hindi.explanation: समबाहु त्रिभुज में DE, BC के आधे के बराबर है। AD + CE + BC = 30 सेमी से BC = 15 सेमी। BCED का परिमाप = 15 + 7.5 + 7.5 + 7.5 = 37.5 सेमी।

questions.original_question: Find the value of tan35&deg; cot40&deg; tan45&deg; cot50&deg; tan55&deg;.

english.explanation: Using trigonometric identities: tan35° × cot40° × tan45° × cot50° × tan55° = tan35° × tan50° × 1 × tan40° × cot35° = 1.

hindi.explanation: trigonometric identities के उपयोग से: tan35° × cot40° × tan45° × cot50° × tan55° = 1।

questions.original_question: A sold an article to B at a profit of 25%. B sold it to C at a profit of 15%. The profit made by B is Rs. 40 less than the profit made by A. What is the cost price (in Rs.) of the article for A?

english.explanation: Let A's CP = x. B's SP = 1.25x × 1.15 = 1.4375x. Profit of A = 0.25x, profit of B = 0.1875x. Given 0.25x - 0.1875x = 40 ⇒ x = 640.
Computer Science in A and C = 57 + 51 = 108. Arts in B and D = 45 + 45 = 90. Percentage = (108 / 90) × 100 = 120%.

questions.original_question: Weight of A is 20% more than weight of B, whose weight is 30% more than weight of C. By how much percent weight of A is more than weight of C?

english.explanation: Let C = 100. B = 130. A = 1.2 × 130 = 156. A is 56% more than C.

questions.original_question: A certain sum amounts to Rs. 81840 in 3 years and to Rs. 92400 in 5 years at x% p.a. under simple interest. If the rate of interest is becomes (x + 2)%, then in how many years will the same sum double itself?

english.explanation: Using simple interest: Difference in 2 years = 10560 ⇒ P = 528000. At 10%, time to double is 10 years.

hindi.explanation: साधारण ब्याज के सूत्र से: 2P = P + P×(x+2)×t → t = 10 वर्ष।

questions.original_question: The average of squares of five consecutive odd natural numbers is 233. What is the average of the largest number and the smallest number?

english.explanation: Let numbers be x-4, x-2, x, x+2, x+4. Average of squares = x² + 8 = 233 ⇒ x = 15. Numbers are 11,13,15,17,19. Average of smallest and largest = (11+19)/2 = 15.

hindi.explanation: पाँच क्रमिक विषम संख्याओं के वर्गों का औसत 233 है। संख्याएँ 11,13,15,17,19 हैं। सबसे बड़ी और छोटी का औसत = (19+11)/2 = 15।

questions.original_question: In&nbsp;&Delta;ABC, D is a point on side AB such that BD = 3 cm and DA = 4 cm. E is a point on BC such that DE || AC. Then Area of&nbsp;&Delta;BDE : Area of trapezium ACED&nbsp;

english.explanation: In triangle ABC, since DE is parallel to AC, triangles BDE and BAC are similar. The ratio of BD to BA is 3/7, so the area ratio of BDE to BAC is (3/7)^2 = 9/49. The area of trapezium ACED is the remaining area, which is 1 - 9/49 = 40/49. Thus, the ratio of areas BDE:ACED is 9:40.

hindi.explanation: ΔABC में, DE || AC है, इसलिए ΔBDE ~ ΔBAC के समरूप हैं। BD/AB = 3/7 है, इसलिए क्षेत्रफल अनुपात (3/7)^2 = 9/49 है। त्रिभुज BDE का क्षेत्रफल 9 भाग और त्रिभुज ABC का क्षेत्रफल 49 भाग है। शेष क्षेत्रफल (49 - 9 = 40 भाग) समलंब ACED और अन्य भागों को मिलाकर बनता है। समलंब ACED का क्षेत्रफल ज्यामितीय नियमों से निकाले जाने पर, अनुपात 9:40 प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Simplify (x - y + z)<sup>2</sup> - (x - y - z)<sup>2</sup>.

english.explanation: We use the difference of squares formula: a² - b² = (a - b)(a + b). Let a = (x - y + z) and b = (x - y - z). Then, (a - b) = 2z and (a + b) = 2x - 2y. Multiplying these gives 2z * (2x - 2y) = 4xz - 4yz.
key_concepts: Difference of squares formula (a² - b² = (a - b)(a + b))

hindi.explanation: दिए गए व्यंजक (x - y + z)² - (x - y - z)² को सरल करने के लिए, हम दो वर्गों के अंतर के सूत्र a² - b² = (a - b)(a + b) का उपयोग करते हैं। यहाँ, a = (x - y + z) और b = (x - y - z) है। इस प्रकार, व्यंजक को [(x - y + z) - (x - y - z)] * [(x - y + z) + (x - y - z)] के रूप में लिखा जा सकता है। प्रथम भाग में, (x - y + z) - (x - y - z) = 2z और द्वितीय भाग में, (x - y + z) + (x - y - z) = 2x - 2y होता है। इन दोनों का गुणा करने पर, 2z * (2x - 2y) = 4xz - 4yz प्राप्त होता है। अतः सही उत्तर विकल्प 4 है।
key_concepts: दो वर्गों के अंतर का सूत्र (a² - b² = (a - b)(a + b))

questions.original_question: The area of a quadrant of a circle is&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{\pi}{9}\)</span> m<sup>2</sup>. Its radius (in meters) is equal to:

english.explanation: The area of a quadrant of a circle is one-fourth the area of the full circle. The formula for the area of a quadrant is $\frac{1}{4} \pi r^2$. Given that the area is $\frac{\pi}{9}$, we set up the equation: $\frac{1}{4} \pi r^2 = \frac{\pi}{9}$. Simplifying by canceling $\pi$ from both sides gives $\frac{1}{4} r^2 = \frac{1}{9}$. Multiplying both sides by 4 yields $r^2 = \frac{4}{9}$. Taking the square root gives $r = \frac{2}{3}$. Thus, the radius is $\frac{2}{3}$ meters.

hindi.explanation: एक वृत्त के चतुर्थांश का क्षेत्रफल सूत्र है: $\frac{1}{4} \pi r^2$। दिए गए क्षेत्रफल $\frac{\pi}{9}$ के बराबर सेट करने पर: $\frac{1}{4} \pi r^2 = \frac{\pi}{9}$। दोनों तरफ $\pi$ को हटाने पर: $\frac{1}{4} r^2 = \frac{1}{9}$। $r^2$ को हल करने पर: $r^2 = \frac{4}{9}$। इसलिए $r = \sqrt{\frac{4}{9}} = \frac{2}{3}$ मीटर। विकल्प 3 सही है।
key_concepts: वृत्त के चतुर्थांश का क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{4} \pi r^2$
समीकरण को हल करके त्रिज्या ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: If sin(20 + x)&deg; = cos 60&deg;, 0&nbsp;&le; (20 + x)&nbsp;&le; 90, then find the value of 2sin<sup>2</sup>(3x + 15)&deg; - cosec<sup>2</sup>(2x + 10)&deg;.

english.explanation: Given sin(20 + x)° = cos 60°, we know cos 60° = 1/2. Since sin θ = 1/2 in the range 0 ≤ θ ≤ 90°, θ = 30°. Solving 20 + x = 30° gives x = 10°. Substituting x = 10° into the expression: 2sin²(3x + 15)° - cosec²(2x + 10)° = 2sin²(45°) - cosec²(30°). sin(45°) = √2/2, so sin²(45°) = 1/2 → 2*(1/2) = 1. cosec(30°) = 1/sin(30°) = 2 → cosec²(30°) = 4. Final result: 1 - 4 = -3.
key_concepts: Evaluating sine and cosecant of standard angles (30°, 45°, etc.)

hindi.explanation: हम समीकरण sin(20 + x)° = cos 60° को हल करते हैं। cos 60° = 1/2 होता है, इसलिए sin(20 + x)° = 1/2 होगा। 0 ≤ (20 + x) ≤ 90 की सीमा में sin θ = 1/2 होता है जब θ = 30°, इसलिए 20 + x = 30 होगा, जिससे x = 10 प्राप्त होता है। अब 2sin²(3x + 15)° - cosec²(2x + 10)° का मान ज्ञात करते हैं: 2sin²(45)° - cosec²(30)° = 2*(1/√2)² - (2)² = 2*(1/2) - 4 = 1 - 4 = -3 इसलिए, सही उत्तर -3 है।
key_concepts: त्रिकोणमिति के मूल्यों का ज्ञान (sin, cos, cosec)

questions.original_question: What is the value of k such that number of 72k460k is divisible by 6?

english.explanation: A number is divisible by 6 if it is divisible by both 2 and 3. For divisibility by 2, the last digit (k) must be even. Among the options, only 4 and 8 are even. For divisibility by 3, the sum of the digits (7 + 2 + k + 4 + 6 + 0 + k = 19 + 2k) must be divisible by 3. Testing k=4: 19 + 2(4) = 27 (divisible by 3). Testing k=8: 19 + 2(8) = 35 (not divisible by 3). Thus, k=4 satisfies both conditions.
key_concepts: Sum of digits for divisibility by 3

questions.original_question: In a circle with center O and radius 13 cm, a chord AB is drawn. Tangents at A and B intersects at P such that&nbsp;&ang;APB = 60&deg;. If the distance of AB from the center O is 5 cm, then what is the length (in cm) of AP?

english.explanation: Given a circle with radius 13 cm and chord AB at distance 5 cm from the center, the length of AB is calculated using the formula AB = 2√(r² - d²) = 24 cm. Since tangents from P to A and B are equal (PA = PB), triangle APB is isosceles with ∠APB = 60°, making it equilateral. Hence, PA = AB = 24 cm. Verification via the law of cosines confirms this result.
key_concepts: Perpendicular distance from center to chord
Properties of tangents from an external point

hindi.explanation: दिए गए वृत्त में, जीवा AB की लंबाई 2√(r² - d²) = 2√(13² - 5²) = 24 सेमी है। अब, बिंदु P से स्पर्श रेखाएँ PA और PB खींची गई हैं, जिसमें ∠APB = 60° है। त्रिभुज APB में, PA = PB = x (स्पर्श रेखाओं की समान लंबाई), और AB = 24 सेमी है। कोसाइन नियम के अनुसार, AB² = 2x² - 2x² cos(60°) → 24² = 2x² - x² → x² = 576 → x = 24 सेमी। अतः, AP की लंबाई 24 सेमी है।
key_concepts: स्पर्श रेखाओं की लंबाई समान होती है।
कोसाइन नियम का उपयोग त्रिभुज में भुजाओं की लंबाई निर्धारित करने के लिए किया जाता है।
जीवा की लंबाई की गणना केंद्र से दूरी के सूत्र से की जाती है।

questions.original_question: If sec(5&alpha; - 15&deg;) = cosec(15&deg; - 2<span style="">&alpha;), then the value of cos&alpha; + sin2&alpha; + tan(1.5&alpha;) is:</span>

english.explanation: Given sec(5α - 15°) = cosec(15° - 2α), we use the identity secθ = cosec(90° - θ) to rewrite the equation as cosec(105° - 5α) = cosec(15° - 2α). This leads to the equation sin(105° - 5α) = sin(15° - 2α). Solving for α using the sine identity, we find α = 30° as a valid solution. Substituting α = 30° into cosα + sin2α + tan(1.5α) gives √3/2 + √3/2 + 1 = √3 + 1, which corresponds to option 4.
key_concepts: Using the identity secθ = cosec(90° - θ)
Solving equations involving sine: sinA = sinB
Evaluating trigonometric expressions for specific angles

hindi.explanation: हमें sec(5α - 15°) = cosec(15° - 2α) दिया गया है। जैसा कि हम जानते हैं, secθ = cosec(90° - θ), इसलिए हम समीकरण को लिख सकते हैं: cosec(105° - 5α) = cosec(15° - 2α)। इससे हमें 105° - 5α = 15° - 2α प्राप्त होता है, जिससे α = 30° प्राप्त होता है। अब cos30° + sin60° + tan45° = √3/2 + √3/2 + 1 = √3 + 1 प्राप्त होता है, जो विकल्प 4 है।
key_concepts: कोणों के त्रिकोणमितीय फलनों के मान की गणना
